text: 5-pocket, high-waisted, ankle-length jeans in washed stretch denim with a zip fly and button. Slim legs with raw-edge hems.
Sleeveless, fitted lace top with a small, scalloped stand-up collar, concealed zip at the back of the neck and scalloped hem. Lined.
Cardigan in fine-knit cotton with a round neck, long sleeves and buttons down the front. Ribbing at the cuffs and hem and short slits in the sides.
Cargo trousers in a cotton weave with an elasticated drawstring waist, side pockets, flap leg pockets and fake back pockets with a flap. Tapered legs with elasticated hems. Jersey lining.
Headband in a soft knit containing some wool with a draped detail at the front. Width 10 cm.
Oversized jumper in a soft wool and mohair blend knit with low-dropped shoulders and wide balloon sleeves with narrow cuffs.
Thong briefs in lace and mesh with a mid waist, lined gusset, narrow sides and string back.
Metal rings in various designs.
Long-sleeved top in jersey made from a cotton blend with a print motif.
Striped bow tie in satin with an adjustable strap and fastening at the back. Width 11 cm.

Baby Exclusive. Dungarees in soft, fine-knit organic cotton with ribbed straps that fasten at the back. Contrasting-colour striped frill trim at the top that continues over to the back, and ribbed hems.
Long-sleeved top in patterned cotton jersey.
Straight-cut dress in sturdy jersey with 3/4-length sleeves and front pockets. Unlined.
Biker jacket in grained imitation leather with a zip down the front and notch lapels with decorative press-studs. Zipped pockets and a zip at the cuffs. Lined.
Matt opaque tights with a control top to hold in the tummy and bum. 100 denier.
Leggings in extra sturdy jersey with an elasticated waist.
Long-sleeved top in soft cotton jersey with a motif on the front. Slightly longer at the back.
Leggings in stretch jersey with an elasticated waist.
Lined triangle bikini top with moulded, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage and ties at the back.
Bikini briefs in organic cotton with lace trims, a low waist, lined gusset, and medium coverage at the back.
